bill_title: make an appropriation for the purposes of aerial predator control and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation for the purposes of predator control and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the total sum of $150,000 to the Department of Agriculture and Natural Resources for the purpose of predator control. Section 2. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the total sum of $150,000 to the Department of Game, Fish and Parks for the purpose of predator control. Section 3. The secretary of the Department of Agriculture and Natural Resources shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized in section 1 of this Act related to the Department of Agriculture and Natural Resources. Section 4. The secretary of the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized in section 2 of this Act related to the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. Section 5. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 6. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

bill_versions.bill_version: House Agriculture and Natural Resources Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to make an appropriation for the purposes of aerial predator control and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. Section 4. The secretary of the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized in section 2 of this Act related to the Department of Game, Fish and Parks. Section 5. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 6. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
